nodes.name: calculateClaimable

params._amount: The amount of Bitcoin provided to the Darknodes in Sats.
params._beneficiary: The address of the recipient entitled to claim the vested tokens.
params._duration: The number of months for the vesting period.
params._nHash: The hash of the nonce returned by the Darknodes.
params._sig: The signature returned by the Darknodes.
params._startTime: The start time (in seconds since Unix epoch) at which the vesting                   period should begin.

params._to: The Ethereum address of the beneficiary.
The Bitcoin address to which the beneficiary will receive            their Bitcoin.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addVestingSchedule(address,uint256,uint1.notice: Allows the contract owner to add a vesting schedule for a         beneficiary.

calculateClaimable(address).notice: Retrieves the claimable amount for a given beneficiary.

claim(bytes).notice: Allows a beneficiary to withdraw their vested Bitcoin.
